statements: UPDATE documents SET document_content='Updated content' WHERE document_id=1;

UPDATE documents SET document_name = 'New Document Name', document_content = 'New Document Content' WHERE document_id = 1;
UPDATE documents SET last_modified_at = current_timestamp(), document_name = 'Updated Document Name' WHERE document_id = 2;
UPDATE notifications SET content = 'New Content', created_at = '2022-01-01 12:00:00' WHERE notification_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET role = 'Admin', created_at = '2022-02-15 10:30:00' WHERE user_id = 3;
